parameters.name: AppGroup
parameters.description: The name of the application group.

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description: The language used by the client.

parameters.name: PackageName
parameters.description: The name of the Android application package. This parameter is required if you create an Android application.

parameters.name: RealRegionId
parameters.description: The region where the application resides. You can leave this parameter empty or set it to China East 2 Finance.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SiteType
parameters.description: The application type. Valid values: web, miniapp, ios, and android.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The source. This is a reserved parameter.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The list of tags. You can specify a maximum of 20 tags.
